roleset.name: to suggest

example.name: transitive
example.text: Of the approximately 200 sponsors of the recent march in Washington for the homeless , you-1 chose [*-1] to cite such groups as the National Association of Home Builders and the International Union of Bricklayers and Allied Craftsmen , [*-1] insinuating that the march got its major support from self - serving groups that `` [*T*-2] know a good thing when they see it [*T*-3] , '' and that the crusade was based [*-23] on greed or the profit motive .

propbank.arg: that the march got its major support from self-serving groups that `` [*T*-2] know a good thing when they see it [*T*-3] , ''

roleset.note: INSINUATE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls say-37.7. (from insinuate.01-v)
